TopicTitle: Rocket Blueprint / Exploded View Mod (updated KVV?)

Articles.Content: I know there was a mod for 0.24.2 that gave you the ability to create blueprints and exploded (no, not pile of rubble exploded) view of your rockets. I think it was called KVV and was on Curse (can't navigate to curse right now: work firewall). Anyone know if the author intends to update or if someone is planing on making something simular?
I've heard of a mod like that...let me do some searching to refind that link.
thanks, I knew what it was, but, since I don't use it personally, I had no reference to follow and locate it! Looks like you have an answer, TheAlmightyOS!
